description:
In pursuit of powder. Built to be durable and versatile, the Free 97 is built with Dynafits lightweight Poplar core and carbon speed stringers to reduce weight and improve the stiffness and strength of the ski. A versatile waist and twin rocker design lends a surfy feel that's straight-up fun in deep, soft snow. From hut tours to high level traverses, these skis are ready and reliable to tackle the far side of the mountain with you.

  • Poplar core feels light underfoot and offers good shock absorption and stability
  • Versatile 97mm waist performs well in the backcountry
  • Single radius sidecut for adaptability in tricky terrain and changing conditions
  • Full impact-resistant ABS sidewalls give you serious force absorption, even when skiing over rocks
  • Carbon speed stringers improve power, energy and dampness
  • Built-in aluminum tip optimizes the skin anchor point and minimizes vibration
  • Traditional camber underfoot keeps the ski responsive in mixed conditions
  • Double rocker profile floats through deep snow without sacrificing stability and power
name: Dynafit Free 97 Skis - Women's
